mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.daily_id AS "dailyId", a.table_name AS "tableName", a.cms_id AS "cmsId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a2 ON a2.id = a.table_name LEFT JOIN sys_area a5 ON a5.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_daily_list_content( id, daily_id, table_name, cms_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dailyId}, #{tableName}, #{cmsId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_daily_list_content SET daily_id=#{dailyId}, table_name = #{tableName}, cms_id = #{cmsId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

LEFT JOIN cms_news b ON a.cms_id = b.id AND b.del_flag = '0' WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.daily_id = #{dailyId} AND a.table_name = 'cms_news'
